verses.text: \w But|strong="H6258"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w younger|strong="H6810"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w scorn|strong="H7832"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w whose|strong="H0834"\w* \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* \w I|strong="H0834"\w* \w would|strong="H0834"\w* not \w have|strong="H0834"\w* \w set|strong="H7896"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w flock|strong="H6629"\w*:

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* whose \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w was|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w as|strong="H1571"\w* nothing, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w were|strong="H3027"\w* thought unworthy \w of|strong="H3027"\w* life \w itself|strong="H1571"\w*.

\w Barren|strong="H1565"\w* with \w want|strong="H2639"\w* \w and|strong="H6723"\w* hunger, who gnawed \w in|strong="H0570"\w* \w the|strong="H0570"\w* wilderness, disfigured with \w calamity|strong="H7722"\w* \w and|strong="H6723"\w* misery.

\w And|strong="H3899"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* ate grass, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* barks \w of|strong="H5921"\w* trees, \w and|strong="H3899"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w root|strong="H8328"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* junipers \w was|strong="H3899"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w food|strong="H3899"\w*.

Who snatched \w up|strong="H5921"\w* these things \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* valleys, \w and|strong="H7321"\w* \w when|strong="H4480"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* had found \w any|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w*, \w they|strong="H5921"\w* ran \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w a|strong="H4480"\w* \w cry|strong="H7321"\w*.

They \w dwelt|strong="H7931"\w* \w in|strong="H7931"\w* \w the|strong="H7931"\w* desert places \w of|strong="H6083"\w* torrents, \w and|strong="H6083"\w* \w in|strong="H7931"\w* caves \w of|strong="H6083"\w* \w earth|strong="H6083"\w*, or upon \w the|strong="H7931"\w* gravel.

\w They|strong="H7880"\w* pleased themselves \w among|strong="H0996"\w* these kind \w of|strong="H8478"\w* things, \w and|strong="H8478"\w* counted \w it|strong="H8478"\w* delightful \w to|strong="H8478"\w* be \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* briers.

\w The|strong="H4480"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w foolish|strong="H5036"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* base \w men|strong="H1121"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H1571"\w* appearing \w at|strong="H0776"\w* \w all|strong="H4480"\w* upon \w the|strong="H4480"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H6258"\w* \w I|strong="H6258"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w turned|strong="H1961"\w* \w into|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w song|strong="H5058"\w*, \w and|strong="H1961"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w become|strong="H1961"\w* \w their|strong="H1992"\w* \w byword|strong="H4405"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w abhor|strong="H8581"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* flee \w far|strong="H7368"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w are|strong="H3808"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* afraid \w to|strong="H6440"\w* spit \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w my|strong="H4480"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* hath \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* quiver, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* hath afflicted \w me|strong="H7971"\w*, \w and|strong="H7971"\w* hath \w put|strong="H7971"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w bridle|strong="H7448"\w* into \w my|strong="H7971"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6440"\w*.

\w At|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w rising|strong="H6965"\w*, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* calamities forthwith \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*: \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* overthrown \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w have|strong="H5921"\w* overwhelmed \w me|strong="H7971"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w paths|strong="H0734"\w* \w as|strong="H6965"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* waves.

\w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* destroyed \w my|strong="H3808"\w* ways, \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* lain \w in|strong="H3808"\w* wait against \w me|strong="H3808"\w*, \w and|strong="H3808"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* prevailed, \w and|strong="H3808"\w* there \w was|strong="H3808"\w* \w none|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H3808"\w* \w help|strong="H5826"\w*.

\w They|strong="H6556"\w* have rushed \w in|strong="H8478"\w* upon \w me|strong="H8478"\w*, \w as|strong="H8478"\w* when \w a|strong="H8478"\w* wall is broken, \w and|strong="H7342"\w* \w a|strong="H8478"\w* gate opened, \w and|strong="H7342"\w* have \w rolled|strong="H1556"\w* themselves \w down|strong="H1556"\w* \w to|strong="H0857"\w* \w my|strong="H8478"\w* miseries.

\w I|strong="H5921"\w* am brought \w to|strong="H5921"\w* nothing: \w as|strong="H7291"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w* thou hast \w taken|strong="H5674"\w* \w away|strong="H2015"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* desire: \w and|strong="H7307"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w prosperity|strong="H3444"\w* hath \w passed|strong="H5674"\w* \w away|strong="H2015"\w* \w like|strong="H2015"\w* \w a|strong="H5921"\w* \w cloud|strong="H5645"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3117"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* fadeth \w within|strong="H5921"\w* \w myself|strong="H5315"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* affliction possess \w me|strong="H5315"\w*.

\w In|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w bone|strong="H6106"\w* \w is|strong="H3808"\w* pierced \w with|strong="H5921"\w* sorrows: \w and|strong="H3915"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* feed \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w sleep|strong="H7901"\w*.

\w With|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H6310"\w* multitude \w of|strong="H6310"\w* them \w my|strong="H6310"\w* \w garment|strong="H3830"\w* \w is|strong="H6310"\w* consumed, \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w they|strong="H6310"\w* have \w girded|strong="H0247"\w* me about, as \w with|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H6310"\w* \w collar|strong="H6310"\w* \w of|strong="H6310"\w* \w my|strong="H6310"\w* \w coat|strong="H3801"\w*.
I am compared \w to|strong="H6083"\w* \w dirt|strong="H6083"\w*, \w and|strong="H6083"\w* am likened \w to|strong="H6083"\w* embers \w and|strong="H6083"\w* \w ashes|strong="H0665"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w cry|strong="H7768"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* thee, \w and|strong="H5975"\w* thou hearest \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w*: \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w stand|strong="H5975"\w* \w up|strong="H5975"\w*, \w and|strong="H5975"\w* thou dost \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w regard|strong="H0995"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.

Thou art \w changed|strong="H2015"\w* \w to|strong="H3027"\w* \w be|strong="H3027"\w* \w cruel|strong="H0393"\w* \w toward|strong="H3027"\w* \w me|strong="H7852"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w in|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H3027"\w* hardness \w of|strong="H3027"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* thou art \w against|strong="H7852"\w* \w me|strong="H7852"\w*.

Thou hast \w lifted|strong="H5375"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, \w and|strong="H7307"\w* \w set|strong="H5375"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w* \w as|strong="H0413"\w* \w it|strong="H5375"\w* were \w upon|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0413"\w* \w wind|strong="H7307"\w*, \w and|strong="H7307"\w* thou hast mightily dashed \w me|strong="H0413"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* thou wilt deliver \w me|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, \w where|strong="H1004"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w is|strong="H3605"\w* \w appointed|strong="H4150"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* liveth.

\w But|strong="H0518"\w* \w yet|strong="H0389"\w* thou stretchest \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w forth|strong="H7971"\w* thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w to|strong="H7971"\w* \w their|strong="H7971"\w* consumption: \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w if|strong="H0518"\w* \w they|strong="H0518"\w* \w shall|strong="H3808"\w* fall \w down|strong="H7971"\w* thou wilt save.

\w I|strong="H0518"\w* \w wept|strong="H1058"\w* heretofore \w for|strong="H3117"\w* \w him|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w was|strong="H3117"\w* afflicted, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w my|strong="H0518"\w* \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* \w had|strong="H3117"\w* compassion \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w poor|strong="H0034"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3588"\w* expected \w good|strong="H2896"\w* things, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* evils are \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w upon|strong="H0935"\w* \w me|strong="H0935"\w*: \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w waited|strong="H3176"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w darkness|strong="H0652"\w* broke \w out|strong="H7451"\w*.

\w My|strong="H3808"\w* inner \w parts|strong="H4578"\w* \w have|strong="H3117"\w* boiled \w without|strong="H3808"\w* \w any|strong="H3808"\w* rest, \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* affliction \w have|strong="H3117"\w* prevented \w me|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* \w mourning|strong="H6937"\w* \w without|strong="H3808"\w* indignation; \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w rose|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w cried|strong="H7768"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H1980"\w* \w crowd|strong="H6951"\w*.

\w I|strong="H1961"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w brother|strong="H0251"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* dragons, \w and|strong="H0251"\w* \w companion|strong="H7453"\w* \w of|strong="H1323"\w* \w ostriches|strong="H3284"\w*.

\w My|strong="H5921"\w* \w skin|strong="H5785"\w* \w is|strong="H5785"\w* become \w black|strong="H7835"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w me|strong="H5921"\w*, \w and|strong="H5785"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w are|strong="H6106"\w* dried \w up|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* heat.

\w My|strong="H1961"\w* \w harp|strong="H3658"\w* \w is|strong="H6963"\w* \w turned|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w mourning|strong="H0060"\w*, \w and|strong="H6963"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* organ \w into|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w of|strong="H6963"\w* \w those|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H1961"\w* \w weep|strong="H1058"\w*.
